article: vietnam 's state-owned enterprises -lrb- soes -rrb- have called for more business autonomy in order to boost the slow-moving pace of the government 's ##-year-old reform process , according to a report of vietnam news on thursday .
abstract: vietnam 's state-owned firms demand more business autonomy
